title: How to get texting records for a cell phone - Quora

response.answer_text: Get a warrant and then go through the cell phone provider.  Of course, this will only work with actual SMS messages and the content might not be there. If you're not a law enforcement, not only is this illegal, but likely impossible.
You contact your phone company (Verizon, Sprint, etc.) and ask for a copy, but you can only do it if you are the main account holder.
